snippet.title: Ape Academy | Ape Escape Academy - PlayStation Portable Gameplay [PlayStation 4 Re-Release]
snippet.description:
Ape Academy (or Ape Escape Academy in the US) got a re-release on the PlayStation 4 and 5 as part of the PlayStation Classics line on PS+ Premium. You can also buy the game separately if you don't have a PS+ Premium subscription. This re-release features trophy support (both PS4 and PS5 have separate trophy lists), remote play, save states and a rewind mode. And yes, I got the game free because I actually had the original PSP version in my PSN account, which is a nice touch.

Ape Academy / Ape Escape Academy (C) Sony Interactive Entertainment

#apeescape #apeescapeacademy #apeacademy #playstationclassics #ps4 #psp #playstation4 #playstationportable #playstationpluspremium #psplus #pspluspremium
